interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Hair Straightener, Flat Iron for Hair Styling, 2 in 1 Hair Curling and Straightening Tool, Non-Damage Floating Ceramic Plates, Adjustable Temperature 300°F-450°F for All Hair Types and Lengths Review Date: 2019/01/05 Store: COOQIN Product Description: ['If you’ve ever had your ‘do coiffed by a professional hair stylist or visited a salon, chances are you’ve heard the word ‘AUTENPOO’ tossed around a time or two. Known for its ability to strengthen hair and restore your strands to their original shine, AUTENPOO is a powerhouse nutrient in the field of hairstyling. When putting your hair under the intense heat of a flat iron or hair straightener, you’ll probably find that breakage and damage are that much more common. Packed with all sort of high-tech features and gizmos, AUTENPOO’s hair flat iron brings salon-worthy results without the harsh damage of most styling devices for a natural, healthy shine with each use! Top features of AUTENPOO hair straightener: Fast heating time&Sleep mode ●Fully heats up in 30 Seconds, Automatically switches off irons after 60 minutes. Gentle ceramic plate design ●Adds shine to make the appearance of curls more polished and increase the overall look of straightened hair for a healthier gloss. Floating Plate Design ●Particularly beneficial for users with naturally wavy or curly hair, which can have a tendency to easily snag in hair styling tools, also ensures that your gorgeous curls won’t be damaged. Heats Between 300° F And 450° F ●Depending on the thickness and texture of your hair, you may need to change it up from time to time. 360° swivel cord for easy maneuverability ● No more tangled messes or twisted cords, with this hair straightener you can easily reach delicate fly-aways and seemingly invisible back sections without the hassle of a tangled or knotted cord ever again. What‘s in the package: 1 x Hair Straightener 1 x User’s manual'] Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Shape': 'Flat', 'Brand': 'COOQIN', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Color': 'Gold', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '13.17 x 3.93 x 1.96 inches; 1 Pounds', 'UPC': '653437418216', 'Manufacturer': 'COOQIN'} Review Text: You simply cannot do better than this one. It does not do damage to your hair. I am convinced of that. Actually seems to leave my hair healthier and shinier than when I started out using it.
There are 5 temperature settings, 300 to 450 degrees.
Takes less than one minute to totally heat up.
98 inch super long cord that swivels 360 degrees. You don't get tangled up at all.
Great for traveling and shuts off automatically after 60 minutes.
Highly recommended Review Title: This one is the Cadillac of curling irons/hair straighteners Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
6 Pack Wig Caps, Neutral Nude Beige and Black, Nylon and Mesh BTOOP {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Brand': 'BTOOP', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '5.98 x 4.02 x 2.01 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '711420853809'} These are so helpful to wear underneath my wig. It keeps all my natural hair flat and tucked under the cap so that I don't get those little strays that poke out the sides or out the bottom.
These are just a great solution for that issue and these are the best I have ever used.
Great price and well made. What more could you ask? It will take you a long time to wear these out and I don't ever want to be without them. Highly recommended BeautyBio GloPRO Attachment Heads {'Product Dimensions': '4 x 2.1 x 4 inches; 4.16 Ounces', 'Item model number': '78355R.V1', 'UPC': '810813030398', 'Manufacturer': 'Beauty Bioscience', 'Country of Origin': 'China'} This is an impressive item. Goes with the GloPRO package that has several attachments. This is one of the attachments.
I don't have the GloPRO system yet but may soon purchase one. In the meantime I used this manually to get a feel of what it would be like.
This is a great product. It is nicely packaged. It makes your skin glowing with health....truly it does.
My dermatologist is a big fan of this product. I am very impressed Hair Straightener, Flat Iron for Hair Styling, 2 in 1 Hair Curling and Straightening Tool, Non-Damage Floating Ceramic Plates, Adjustable Temperature 300°F-450°F for All Hair Types and Lengths COOQIN ['If you’ve ever had your ‘do coiffed by a professional hair stylist or visited a salon, chances are you’ve heard the word ‘AUTENPOO’ tossed around a time or two. What‘s in the package: 1 x Hair Straightener 1 x User’s manual'] {'Shape': 'Flat', 'Brand': 'COOQIN', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Color': 'Gold', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '13.17 x 3.93 x 1.96 inches; 1 Pounds', 'UPC': '653437418216', 'Manufacturer': 'COOQIN'} You simply cannot do better than this one. profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Preferred Product Types**: Continues to favor wig accessories, particularly wig caps, while now showing increased interest in hairstyling tools that prioritize hair health.
- **Material Preference**: Maintains a preference for synthetic materials in wig accessories, while appreciating ceramic materials in hairstyling tools for their gentle nature.
- **Quality and Durability**: Values well-crafted products with long-lasting performance, demonstrated by a recent positive experience with a high-rated styling tool that promotes shine and health.
- **Functionality**: Focuses on practical grooming solutions that enhance wig wear and hair care, indicating a holistic approach to beauty routines.
- **Price Sensitivity**: Remains a savvy consumer, looking for competitively priced products that do not compromise on quality or effectiveness.
- **User Experience**: Engages in hands-on testing of beauty tools, seeking out those that address specific hair styling needs and improve overall hair health.
- **Overall Satisfaction**: Displays a high propensity to recommend products, particularly those that exceed expectations, as evidenced by commendations for a recently used styling tool's performance and features.

The user consistently seeks out durable, effective, and cost-efficient solutions while exploring new avenues to enhance their beauty and grooming routine, now including advanced hairstyling tools that align with their existing preferences.
